This actually sounds like a bug in FireFox 57 and not FireFox 58. The page has `overflow: hidden` on the body tag which **should** prevent scrolling. 

I forked your repo and created 2 examples showing the difference in behavior with and without  
`overflow: hidden`

No Scrolling: https://xanderluciano.github.io/firefox_scroll_bug/no-scroll.html
Scrolling: https://xanderluciano.github.io/firefox_scroll_bug/scroll.html

If they are both scrolling in FireFox 57 then it's a bug in FireFox 57 as the behavior is as expected in Chrome 65 and FireFox 58 (can't find a standalone download for 57 right now).

Woops.. I got the Firefox version number wrong. The bug occurs in FF 57+,
but is absent in FF 56.
I'm delighted to learn that the issue comes down to simply setting a flag.
That should make it quite easy to fix this "bug" in my program code :)))

Thank you!
